readable.content: A child on the beach while a woman takes pictures nearby . A little girl in red at the beach while a adult points a camera . A man and a girl are at the shoreline while the man takes a picture and the girl hods a doll A woman is taking a photograph on a beach at the edge of the water while a girl stands in the foreground . A woman taking pictures of the surf and a child in the foreground .
